title: Tactile Manipulation sensor
description: Designed and fabricated a novel tactile sensor on a flexible PCB using Altium Designer for advanced robotic manipulation. This sensor provides nuanced data on grip force and shear direction.

modalContent.value: Designed and fabricated a novel tactile sensor on a flexible PCB using Altium Designer for advanced robotic manipulation. This sensor provides nuanced data on grip force and shear direction, enhancing a robot's ability to handle delicate objects.
